sentences.en: A process for printing from a smooth surface, as lithography offset.
sentences.cn: 照相(影印)平版印刷(法)根据摄影图像制作的,使用印版的平面印刷过程.

sentences.en: A process for printing from a smooth surface, as lithography or offset.
sentences.cn: 利用金属或石头表面的平版印刷.

sentences.en: Blanket in Nano - imprint lithography procedure of periodic alternating stress of deformation.
sentences.cn: 橡皮布在不抬印历程洋,受到周期性接变答力的功用,爆发形变.

sentences.en: Composition rich in imaginative design, lithography wonderful way abnormal.
sentences.cn: 设计构图想象力丰富, 刻制手法异常奇妙.

sentences.en: Durable , white, water - resistant, low shrinkage resin for stereo lithography for SLA system.
sentences.cn: 应用于立体光刻技术的耐久性, 白色, 防水和低收缩的树脂.

sentences.en: Electron - beam lithography with a novel multilevel resist structure defines the pattern.
sentences.cn: 采用新型的多层抗蚀剂结构的电子束光刻来形成图形.

sentences.en: Imprint lithography is a low - cost high - efficiency patterning technique - 100 nm resolution.
sentences.cn: 压印光刻技术是一种低成本的 微细 制造技术.

sentences.en: In this paper, Focused Ion Beam Lithography technology and is introduced.
sentences.cn: 对聚焦离子束曝光技术作了介绍.

sentences.en: Individual sodium titanate nanowire - based device is fabricated via e - beam lithography techniques.
sentences.cn: 利用电子束光刻技术制作了基于钛酸钠纳米线的纳米器件.

sentences.en: Intel continues to use 193 - nm dry lithography at 45 nm.
sentences.cn: intel在45nm上仍然使用193nm波长的干式光刻.

sentences.en: Lithography - The process used to transfer patterns onto wafers.
sentences.cn: 光刻-从掩膜到圆片转移的过程.

sentences.en: Nano - imprint lithography drum paper teeth or wear parts.
sentences.cn: 压印滚筒咬纸牙轴或轴套磨损.

sentences.en: Nano - imprint lithography drum paper teeth spring break.
sentences.cn: 压印滚筒咬纸牙撑簧不续裂.

sentences.en: Paper in Nano - imprint lithography, mechanical deformation and distortion of process water absorption.
sentences.cn: 纸弛在压印的历程洋, 受辛变形也和吸水变形的历程比辛近似.

sentences.en: Solution: fine - tune gripper teeth pad with Nano - imprint lithography drum edge.
sentences.cn: 处置办法: 澈底调不静递纸牙牙垫同压印滚筒外的隔断.

phrases.tran_cn: 电子束曝光；电子束蚀刻
光学平板刻法，光学制版

trans.tran_en: a method of printing in which a pattern is cut into stone or metal so that ink sticks to some parts of it and not others
